column4:
Fast attack damage increased by $I$%.

RPO: Adrenaline now increases the stamina cost of all attacks. Heavy attacks now consume adrenaline instead of stamina but their damage continues to scale on your current stamina level

Strong attack damage increased by $I$%.

RPO: Adrenaline now increases the stamina cost of all attacks. Heavy attacks now consume adrenaline instead of stamina but their damage continues to scale on your current stamina level

Damage from hits received while dodging is reduced by $I$%.

RPO: Dodging now requires adrenaline instead of stamina, missing stamina also increases the damage you receive.

When Vitality reaches 0, Adrenaline Points (if available) will be consumed to restore Vitality. The amount restored is based on the number of Adrenaline Points used, plus an additional $I$%.

RPO: Gaining adrenaline heals based on the stamina you currently have. Higher stamina means more healing.

When Vitality reaches 0, Adrenaline Points (if available) will be consumed to restore Vitality. The amount restored is based on the number of Adrenaline Points used, plus an additional $I$%.

RPO: Gaining adrenaline heals based on the stamina you currently have. Higher stamina means more healing.

When Vitality reaches 0, Adrenaline Points (if available) will be consumed to restore Vitality. The amount restored is based on the number of Adrenaline Points used.

RPO: Gaining adrenaline heals based on the stamina you currently have. Higher stamina means more healing.

Increases Igni Sign intensity by $I$%.

RPO: When reaching 100% stamina, gain a burst of adrenaline.

Increases Yrden Sign intensity by $I$%.

RPO: When hit, if it's the first time you've been in the previous 5 seconds window, you gain stamina.

Alternate Sign Mode:
Maintaining an active shield now drains 50% less Stamina. Stamina drain for blocked attacks unchanged. Damage absorbed by the shield restores player Vitality.

RPO: While Quen is active resources regeneration and consumption are removed (except for signs) and heavy attacks deal more damage while light attacks deal less damage. Attacking drains the shield's health.

Alternate Sign Mode:
Maintaining an active shield no longer drains Stamina. Stamina drain for blocked attacks unchanged. Damage absorbed by the shield restores player Vitality.

RPO: While Quen is active resources regeneration and consumption are removed (except for signs) and heavy attacks deal more damage while light attacks deal less damage. Attacking drains the shield's health.

Each potion dose imbibed heals $I$% of maximum Vitality.

RPO: When at maximum adrenaline, consuming stamina restores health. The lower the stamina the higher the heal.

Blade oils now have $I$% more charges.

RPO: Fast attacks now use adrenaline instead of stamina and their damage now scales on your adrenaline levels.

Increases maximum Vitality by $I$% when Toxicity exceeds the safe threshold.

RPO: As life goes down resources consumption for aggressive actions is more efficient, while resources consumption for defensive actions becomes less efficient.

Toxicity drops $I$ point(s) per second faster.

RPO: Toxicity improves overall resources consumption, higher toxicity means a more efficient resources consumption.
